inKind | Senior Front End Developer | Boulder, CO | ON-Site | Full Time

inKind.com is a B-Corp that provides 0% financing to mission-driven, local businesses like restaurants, bars, gyms, grocery stores, meal delivery companies, etc.

Our front-end developers need to be experts in creating great web experiences, especially within mobile browsers.

Also, every member of our team needs to be extremely passionate about food and local business.

Send info about yourself and your passion of food to miles@inkind.com.
